definition: abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]

sentences.english: Many people have poor handwriting , but dysgraphia is more serious .
sentences.chinese: 許多人的書寫很醜，但是書寫困難更嚴重。

sentences.english: Many people have poor handwriting , but dysgraphia is more serious .
sentences.chinese: 許多人的書寫很醜，但是書寫困難更嚴重。

sentences.english: The receiver's name and address of international mail should be written in English or French.
sentences.chinese: 對於國際郵件，收件人名址應用英文或法文書寫。

sentences.english: Language ability and can write a variety of business documents.
sentences.chinese: 語言表達能力強，能書寫各種業務公文。

sentences.english: Language Brts Songs that Teach English Grammar, Punctuation, and Spelling.
sentences.chinese: 用歌曲來教孩子們拼音書寫。

sentences.english: Please write your name and address in print.
sentences.chinese: 姓名和地址請用印刷體書寫。

sentences.english: The source program is written in a free field format .
sentences.chinese: 原程序是按自由區段格式書寫的。

sentences.english: I turned off the basketball game and started to write.
sentences.chinese: 我關掉了電視上的籃球比賽，開始書寫。

sentences.english: Smooth and beautiful, Zhonghua high quality pencil!
sentences.chinese: 中華鉛筆，品質優良，書寫潤滑，美觀大方。

sentences.english: Please type or write in black to complete this two-page application form in English.
sentences.chinese: 請用英文繕打或以黑色正楷書寫完成此兩頁之申請表。

sentences.english: This graphite could be used in its natural state for writing.
sentences.chinese: 這種石墨可以在自然狀態下用來書寫。

sentences.english: Must have excellent command of English both spoken and written.
sentences.chinese: 優秀的英文口語和英文書寫能力。

sentences.english: I started to write my own oblivious sentences using the grammer i was learning.
sentences.chinese: 我利用我所學的語法知識，開始書寫自己忘記的句子。

sentences.english: When you were a young boy, you would've studied just reading and writing Homer.
sentences.chinese: 希臘男子在幼年時，要學習閱讀書寫荷馬史詩。

sentences.english: The window, his desk writing the lonely.
sentences.chinese: 窗前，他伏案書寫着寂寞。

sentences.english: The Red Army men once wrote down their heroic feat here.
sentences.chinese: 中國工農紅軍也曾在這裏的雪山草地裏書寫壯舉。

definition: to create/to produce/to write/creative work/creation/CL:個|个[ge4]
pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]
